package.name: vizzy_launch
package.description:
This package has the needed launch files for Vizzy's simulation and real robot usage. One can find high-level launches for the most common tasks but feel free to create your own launches.
Acknowledgements: - Rui Figueiredo for the implementation of all the launchers for ROS 1.
package.author: Rui Figueiredo
João Penha Lopes
João Zenário
